synopsis: During World War I, two young British soldiers race against time to deliver a critical message across enemy territory and prevent 1,600 comrades from walking into a deadly ambush, captured in a gripping, real-time cinematic style.
cast: George MacKay, Andrew Scott, Benedict Cumberbatch, Richard Madden

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
synopsis: A cryptic monolith influences human evolution, propelling humanity from prehistoric dawn to a perilous space mission with a sentient AI, exploring existential questions about progress, technology, and cosmic destiny through surreal, philosophical visuals.
cast: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter

title: 6 Underground
synopsis: Six individuals from all around the globe, each the very best at what they do, have been chosen not only for their skill, but for a unique desire to delete their pasts to change the future.
cast: Ryan Reynolds, Mélanie Laurent, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Ben Hardy

title: Hitman: Agent 47
synopsis: An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.
cast: Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware, Zachary Quinto, Ciarán Hinds

title: Bad Boys
synopsis: Two Miami policemen, they have 72 hours to reclaim a consignment of drugs stolen from under their station's nose. To complicate matters, in order to get the assistance of the sole witness to a murder, they have to pretend to be each other.
cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Téa Leoni, Tchéky Karyo

title: Bad Boys II
synopsis: Two Miami narcotics detectives confront chaos as they investigate a dangerous drug cartel, blending explosive action, irreverent humor, and their signature reckless partnership in a high-stakes mission to save the city.
cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Mollà

title: Bad Boys For Life
synopsis: Marcus and Mike are forced to confront new threats, career changes, and midlife crises as they join the newly created elite team AMMO of the Miami police department to take down the ruthless Armando Armas, the vicious leader of a Miami drug cartel.
cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Paola Núñez, Vanessa Hudgens

title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
synopsis: After their late former Captain is framed, Lowrey and Burnett try to clear his name, only to end up on the run themselves.
cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens, Alexander Ludwig

title: Die Hard
synopsis: An off-duty New York cop single-handedly battles a group of terrorists who seize a Los Angeles skyscraper during a Christmas party, using wit and grit to save hostages—including his wife—in a tense, action-packed showdown.
cast: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson

title: Die Hard 2
synopsis: Off-duty cop John McClane battles rogue military operatives who seize control of an airport’s communications during a snowstorm, forcing circling planes—including one carrying his wife—to run out of fuel, leading to a desperate, explosive showdown to avert disaster.
cast: Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Sadler, Franco Nero

title: Die Hard With A Vengeance
synopsis: Targeted by a vengeful terrorist orchestrating a city-wide bombing spree and twisted riddles, John McClane teams up with a Harlem shopkeeper to race across New York, unraveling a plot of revenge and a massive heist in a high-stakes game of survival.
cast: Bruce Willis, Jeremy Irons, Samuel L. Jackson, Graham Greene

title: Live Free or Die Hard
synopsis: John McClane is back and badder than ever, and this time he calls on the services of a young hacker in his bid to stop a ring of Internet terrorists intent on taking control of America's computer infrastructure.
cast: Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long, Maggie Q

title: A Good Day to Die Hard
synopsis: John McClane travels to Moscow to reconnect with his estranged son, a CIA operative, only to uncover a conspiracy involving a nuclear weapons heist and corrupt officials, plunging them into explosive chaos and a tumultuous father-son partnership amid relentless, over-the-top action.
cast: Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch, Yuliya Snigir

title: Batman Begins
synopsis: Haunted by his parents’ murder, Bruce Wayne trains with a shadowy league of assassins before rejecting their brutal justice, embracing his fears to become Gotham’s vigilante protector, Batman, and confront a city-corrupting plot orchestrated by the Scarecrow and his former mentor.
cast: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes

title: The Dark Knight
synopsis: As Batman allies with Commissioner Gordon and DA Harvey Dent to dismantle Gotham’s criminal underworld, the anarchic Joker unleashes chaos, testing their morals and plunging the city into a psychological battle where heroism and villainy blur in a relentless, gritty showdown.
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine

title: The Dark Knight Rises
synopsis: Eight years after retiring Batman, a broken Bruce Wayne resurfaces to face Bane, a masked revolutionary plotting to destroy Gotham, forcing him to overcome physical and emotional scars, rally allies, and sacrifice everything in a climactic battle for the city’s survival and soul.
cast: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman

title: The Fast and The Furious
synopsis: Dominic Toretto is a Los Angeles street racer suspected of masterminding a series of big-rig hijackings. When undercover cop Brian O'Conner infiltrates Toretto's iconoclastic crew, he falls for Toretto's sister and must choose a side: the gang or the LAPD.
cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster

title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
synopsis: Former cop Brian O'Conner teams up with his childhood friend Roman Pearce to take down a drug lord in Miami while evading the law in this high-octane sequel.
cast: Paul Walker, Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes, Cole Hauser

title: The Fast and The Furious: Tokyo Drift
synopsis: In order to avoid a jail sentence, Sean Boswell heads to Tokyo to live with his military father. In a low-rent section of the city, Shaun gets caught up in the underground world of drift racing
cast: Lucas Black, Bow Wow, Sung Kang, Nathalie Kelley

title: Fast & Furious
synopsis: Dom Toretto and Brian O'Conner reunite to take down a heroin importer while seeking revenge for the death of someone close to them.
cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster

title: Fast Five
synopsis: Dom Toretto and Brian O'Conner assemble a team of skilled criminals to pull off a daring heist in Rio de Janeiro while being pursued by a relentless federal agent.
cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Jordana Brewster, Dwayne Johnson

title: Fast & Furious 6
synopsis: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries; Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.
cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Michelle Rodriguez

title: Furious 7
synopsis: Dom Toretto and his crew must face a deadly assassin seeking revenge while also protecting a powerful hacking device in this high-stakes, action-packed installment.
cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham

title: The Fate of The Furious
synopsis: When a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew face trials that will test them as never before.
cast: Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Michelle Rodriguez

title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
synopsis: Ever since US Diplomatic Security Service Agent Hobbs and lawless outcast Shaw first faced off, they just have traded smack talk and body blows. But when cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist Brixton's ruthless actions threaten the future of humanity, they join forces to defeat him.
cast: Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba, Vanessa Kirby

title: F9
synopsis: Dominic Toretto and his crew battle the most skilled assassin and high-performance driver they've ever encountered: his forsaken brother.
cast: Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Tyrese Gibson, John Cena

title: Fast X
synopsis: Dom Toretto and his crew face a formidable new adversary who threatens their family and peace, leading to high-octane action and daring heists across the globe as they race against time to protect what matters most
cast: Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jason Momoa, Brie Larson

title: Inglourious Basterds
synopsis: A group of Jewish-American soldiers, led by the ruthless Lieutenant Aldo Raine, they embark on a mission to assassinate Nazi leaders in occupied France during World War II, intertwining their story with that of a young Jewish cinema owner seeking revenge against the Nazis.
cast: Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Christoph Waltz, Diane Kruger

title: The Bourne Identity
synopsis: A former CIA assassin with amnesia races across Europe to uncover his true identity while evading the agency that created him, gradually piecing together his lethal past as he fights for survival.
cast: Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen

title: The Bourne Supremacy
synopsis: After being framed for a botched CIA operation, amnesiac assassin Jason Bourne resurfaces to clear his name, pursuing those who murdered his girlfriend while uncovering more dark secrets about his past as part of the shadowy Treadstone program.
cast: Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Brian Cox, Julia Stiles

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
synopsis: Former assassin Jason Bourne embarks on a final quest for answers about his true identity, hunting down the architects of the secret CIA program that created him while evading a new generation of deadly agents, ultimately confronting the origin of his transformation into a programmed killer.
cast: Matt Damon, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Joan Allen

title: The Bourne Legacy
synopsis: New CIA operative Aaron Cross experiences life-or-death stakes that have been triggered by the previous actions of Jason Bourne.
cast: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton, Joan Allen

title: Jason Bourne
synopsis: The most dangerous former operative of the CIA is drawn out of hiding to uncover hidden truths about his past.
cast: Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander, Vincent Cassel

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
synopsis: The story of a super-secret spy organization that recruits an unrefined but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.
cast: Colin Firth, Taron Egerton, Samuel L. Jackson, Mark Strong

title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
synopsis: When an attack on the Kingsman headquarters takes place and a new villain rises, Eggsy and Merlin are forced to work together with the American agency known as the Statesman to save the world.
cast: Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong, Julianne Moore

title: The King's Man
synopsis: As a collection of history's worst tyrants and criminal masterminds gather to plot a war to wipe out millions, one man must race against time to stop them.
cast: Ralph Fiennes, Gemma Arterton, Rhys Ifans, Harris Dickinson

title: Family Guy
synopsis: Family Guy follows the crude, outrageous misadventures of the Griffin family, led by dim-witted patriarch Peter, as they navigate everyday life with bizarre humor and frequent pop-culture references.
creator: Seth MacFarlane
cast: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis

title: South Park
synopsis: South Park follows four foul-mouthed fourth-graders in a dysfunctional Colorado town as they encounter outrageous situations that satirize current events, celebrities, and social taboos with crude animation and irreverent humor.
creator: Trey Parker, Matt Stone
cast: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart, Mona Marshall

title: The Cleveland Show
synopsis: The Cleveland Show follows the adventures of Cleveland Brown and his blended family after he moves from Quahog to his hometown in Virginia, navigating life's challenges with his eccentric neighbors and stepchildren.
creator: Seth MacFarlane, Mike Henry, Richard Appel
cast: Mike Henry, Sanaa Lathan, Kevin Michael Richardson, Reagan Gomez-Preston

title: Dr. No
synopsis: A British secret agent James Bond is sent to Jamaica to investigate the death of a fellow agent, which leads him to the underground base of Dr. No, who is plotting to disrupt a space launch from Cape Canaveral.
cast: Sean Connery, Ursula Andress, Joseph Wiseman, Jack Lord

title: From Russia with Love
synopsis: James Bond is enticed into a trap set by SPECTRE involving a Soviet cryptography device and a beautiful Soviet clerk.
cast: Sean Connery, Daniela Bianchi, Pedro Armendáriz, Lotte Lenya

title: Goldfinger
synopsis: British agent James Bond attempts to foil a plot by the megalomaniacal gold magnate Auric Goldfinger to contaminate the United States' gold reserve at Fort Knox.
cast: Sean Connery, Honor Blackman, Gert Fröbe, Shirley Eaton

title: Thunderball
synopsis: James Bond is sent to recover two stolen nuclear warheads from SPECTRE agent Emilio Largo, who is holding the world to ransom.
cast: Sean Connery, Claudine Auger, Adolfo Celi, Luciana Paluzzi

title: You Only Live Twice
synopsis: Agent 007 and the Japanese secret service investigate the hijacking of American and Soviet spacecraft.
cast: Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Mie Hama, Tetsurō Tamba

title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
synopsis: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter to get close to Ernst Stavro Blofeld, in hiding in the Swiss Alps.
cast: George Lazenby, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas, Gabriele Ferzetti

title: Diamonds Are Forever
synopsis: James Bond investigates a diamond smuggling operation, eventually discovering that his nemesis Blofeld is behind it.
cast: Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray, Lana Wood

title: Live and Let Die
synopsis: James Bond is sent to stop a heroin drug lord with a voodoo connection in Harlem and New Orleans.
cast: Roger Moore, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Seymour, Clifton James

title: The Man with the Golden Gun
synopsis: James Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, Francisco Scaramanga, the "Man with the Golden Gun".
cast: Roger Moore, Christopher Lee, Britt Ekland, Maud Adams

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
synopsis: James Bond investigates the theft of submarines, discovering a plot by shipping magnate Karl Stromberg to trigger nuclear war and then create a new civilization beneath the sea.
cast: Roger Moore, Barbara Bach, Curd Jürgens, Richard Kiel

title: Moonraker
synopsis: James Bond is sent to investigate the theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot by Hugo Drax to wipe out humanity on Earth and repopulate the planet with his chosen master race.
cast: Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale, Richard Kiel

title: For Your Eyes Only
synopsis: James Bond is assigned to find a missing British Naval communication device before the Soviets do, encountering a plot involving sunken treasure and assassins.
cast: Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Chaim Topol, Lynn-Holly Johnson

title: Octopussy
synopsis: James Bond investigates the death of a fellow agent, and becomes entangled in a plot to trigger World War III at a US Air Force base in West Germany.
cast: Roger Moore, Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan, Kristina Wayborn

title: A View to a Kill
synopsis: James Bond investigates Max Zorin, who is plotting to destroy California's Silicon Valley in order to create a monopoly in the microchip industry.
cast: Roger Moore, Christopher Walken, Tanya Roberts, Grace Jones

title: The Living Daylights
synopsis: James Bond is sent to investigate the KGB's re-activation of sleeper agents, and uncovers a wider plot involving arms dealing and opium smuggling.
cast: Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Jeroen Krabbé, Joe Don Baker

title: Licence to Kill
synopsis: James Bond seeks revenge on drug lord Franz Sanchez for attacking his CIA friend Felix Leiter and murdering Leiter's wife.
cast: Timothy Dalton, Carey Lowell, Robert Davi, Talisa Soto

title: GoldenEye
synopsis: James Bond must stop a former MI6 agent, codenamed 006, from using a satellite-based weapon, GoldenEye, against London in order to cause global financial meltdown.
cast: Pierce Brosnan, Sean Bean, Izabella Scorupco, Famke Janssen

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
synopsis: James Bond is sent to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to boost ratings for his news network.
cast: Pierce Brosnan, Jonathan Pryce, Michelle Yeoh, Teri Hatcher

title: The World Is Not Enough
synopsis: James Bond is assigned to protect Elektra King, the daughter of an assassinated oil tycoon, from Renard, a former KGB agent-turned-terrorist.
cast: Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle, Denise Richards

title: Die Another Day
synopsis: James Bond is captured and imprisoned in North Korea, and after being freed, he is sent to stop a diamond smuggler who is developing a superweapon.
cast: Pierce Brosnan, Halle Berry, Toby Stephens, Rosamund Pike

title: Casino Royale (2006)
synopsis: James Bond earns 00 status and is sent on his first mission to stop Le Chiffre, a private banker to terrorists, in a high-stakes poker game at Casino Royale.
cast: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Mads Mikkelsen, Judi Dench

title: Quantum of Solace
synopsis: James Bond seeks revenge for the death of Vesper Lynd and uncovers a global conspiracy involving Dominic Greene and his organization Quantum.
cast: Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric, Judi Dench

title: Skyfall
synopsis: James Bond investigates an attack on MI6 and uncovers a plot by former agent Raoul Silva, who seeks revenge against M.
cast: Daniel Craig, Javier Bardem, Judi Dench, Ralph Fiennes

title: Spectre
synopsis: A cryptic message from the past sends James Bond on a rogue mission to Mexico City and eventually Rome, where he meets Lucia Sciarra, the widow of a criminal, and uncovers the existence of the sinister organization Spectre.
cast: Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Léa Seydoux, Ralph Fiennes

title: No Time to Die
synopsis: James Bond has left active service, but his peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter enlists his help to rescue a kidnapped scientist, leading him onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.
cast: Daniel Craig, Léa Seydoux, Rami Malek, Lashana Lynch

title: Mission: Impossible
synopsis: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is framed for the murder of his team and must find the real killer while on the run from his own organization.
cast: Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Béart, Ving Rhames

title: Mission: Impossible 2
synopsis: Ethan Hunt must stop a former IMF agent from releasing a deadly engineered virus while romancing his beautiful accomplice.
cast: Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandiwe Newton, Ving Rhames

title: Mission: Impossible III
synopsis: Retired from active duty, Ethan Hunt is called back into action to confront sadistic arms dealer Owen Davian who threatens Hunt's fiancée.
cast: Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ving Rhames, Michelle Monaghan

title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
synopsis: When the IMF is implicated in a global terrorist bombing plot, Ethan Hunt and his team must go rogue to clear their organization's name.
cast: Tom Cruise, Paula Patton, Simon Pegg, Jeremy Renner

title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
synopsis: Ethan Hunt and his team face off against a network of highly skilled special agents, the Syndicate, who are committed to establishing a new world order.
cast: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
synopsis: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team race against time after a mission gone wrong, with devastating consequences if they fail to recover stolen plutonium.
cast: Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg

title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
synopsis: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous new weapon that threatens all of humanity before it falls into the wrong hands.
cast: Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg

title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
synopsis: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team continue their mission to track down and destroy 'The Entity', a rogue artificial intelligence that threatens all of humanity.
cast: Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg, Esai Morales

title: Top Gear
synopsis: This fast-paced and stunt-filled motor show tests whether cars, both mundane and extraordinary, live up to their manufacturers' claims. The long-running show travels to locations around the world, performing extreme stunts and challenges to see what the featured cars are capable of doing.
creator: Jeremy Clarkson, Andy Wilman
cast: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, James May

title: The Grand Tour
synopsis: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are back with a show about adventure, excitement and friendship... as long as you accept that the people you call friends are also the ones you find extremely annoying. Sometimes it's even a show about cars. Follow them on their global adventure.
creator: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, James May, Andy Wilman
cast: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, James May

title: Point Break
synopsis: An FBI agent goes undercover in a surfing community to investigate a gang of bank robbers who wear presidential masks, only to become entangled with their philosophical leader obsessed with chasing extreme thrills.
cast: Patrick Swayze, Keanu Reeves, Gary Busey, Lori Petty

title: RED
synopsis: A retired CIA black-ops agent reassembles his old team of "Retired, Extremely Dangerous" operatives to survive a government assassination plot and unravel a conspiracy tied to their past missions.
cast: Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, Helen Mirren

title: RED 2
synopsis: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.
cast: Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Mary-Louise Parker, Helen Mirren

title: Top Gun: Maverick
synopsis: Aging fighter pilot Pete "Maverick" Mitchell returns to train a new generation of Top Gun graduates for a perilous mission, confronting his past while mentoring the son of his late best friend.
cast: Tom Cruise, Miles Teller, Jennifer Connelly, Jon Hamm

title: Falling Down
synopsis: A divorced defense engineer's mental breakdown escalates into a violent odyssey across Los Angeles as he confronts societal frustrations while evading police on his daughter's birthday.
cast: Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey, Rachel Ticotin

title: The Departed
synopsis: An undercover cop infiltrates a Boston crime syndicate while a mole within the police force sabotages operations, leading to a deadly game of cat-and-mouse between two moles trying to expose each other.
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg

title: 3 Days of the Condor
synopsis: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his coworkers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.
cast: Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson, Max von Sydow

title: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
synopsis: A joint US-Soviet mission is sent to Jupiter to investigate the mysterious monolith, and the crew discovers a powerful alien presence.
cast: Roy Scheider, John Lithgow, Helen Mirren, Bob Balaban

title: A Clockwork Orange
synopsis: In a dystopian future, a charismatic and violent teenager is caught and subjected to behavior modification treatment, raising questions about free will and morality.
cast: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke

title: Airplane!
synopsis: A parody of disaster movies, following a group of eccentric passengers and crew as they try to survive a series of wacky misadventures on a commercial airliner.
director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker
cast: Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Leslie Nielsen, Peter Graves

title: All the President's Men
synopsis: Two young reporters investigate the Watergate scandal, uncovering a massive conspiracy that reaches the highest levels of government.
cast: Robert Redford, Dustin Hoffman, Jack Warden, Jason Robards

title: Battle of Britain
synopsis: The story of the Battle of Britain, told through the experiences of a group of British fighter pilots as they defend their country against the German Luftwaffe.
cast: Michael Caine, Trevor Howard, Harry Andrews, Christopher Plummer

title: Blazing Saddles
synopsis: A western spoof about a black sheriff who must stop a corrupt politician and his gang from taking over a small town.
cast: Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder, Slim Pickens, Harvey Korman

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
synopsis: The story of two outlaws who flee to Bolivia after a string of successful bank robberies, facing challenges from lawmen and their own friendship.
cast: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin
